'''''Active Camouflage''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to remove the invisibility of at least 2 [[Primal Construct]]s using [[Quicken]], [[Aggravate]], [[Spread]], or [[Truesense Pulse]]s within 3 seconds.
